definitions.definition: To give, pass, or transmit with the hand, literally or figuratively.
definitions.example: He handed them the letter.   She handed responsibility over to her deputy.

definitions.definition: To lead, guide, or assist with the hand; to conduct.
definitions.example: to hand a lady into a carriage

definitions.definition: To seize; to lay hands on.
To pledge by the hand; to handfast.
(in combination) Having a certain kind or number of hands.
(in combination) Having a peculiar or characteristic hand or way of treating others.
With hands joined; hand in hand.
